main event: A round object was sighted in the sky over Saudi Arabia on October 31, 1963.
interesting points: The object appeared and disappeared with a 'decay analysis'.
The object was described as a 'round object' sighted through a window.
The sighting was evaluated as a probable meteor based on the duration, description, and speed of the object.
The sighting was later categorized as a 'Hoax' due to the greater than normal duration and detailed description.
result: Inconclusive, initially evaluated as a probable meteor but later categorized as a 'Hoax'
